text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw | 97% | stars now 15309 → est 36512 (range 36455-36569)
   https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw
2) HKUDS/ClawWork | 96% | stars now 4207 → est 12879 (range 12854-12904)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/ClawWork
3) bwya77/vscode-dark-islands | 94% | stars now 3689 → est 9418 (range 9390-9446)
   https://github.com/bwya77/vscode-dark-islands
4) Conway-Research/automaton | 93% | stars now 1540 → est 4204 (range 4179-4229)
   https://github.com/Conway-Research/automaton
5) millionco/react-doctor | 93% | stars now 3370 → est 7949 (range 7918-7980)
   https://github.com/millionco/react-doctor

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
